languages.text: {n}Тело псайкера с глухим стуком оседает на пол. Тошнотворные отблески хрустальных осколков пси-удушителя, словно иглы зубов чудовищной пасти, отражаются в медленно растекающейся по ним луже крови. Дверь Идиры навсегда закрылась вашими руками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Тело псайкера с глухим стуком оседает на пол. Тошнотворные отблески хрустальных осколков пси-дампера, словно иглы зубов чудовищной пасти, отражаются в медленно растекающейся по ним луже крови. Вам кажется, что они складываются в подобие издевательской улыбки, но, наверное, это лишь игра света. Дверь Идиры навсегда закрылась вашими руками.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira's body falls to the floor with a dull thud. The crystal shards of the psy-stifler resemble horrifying needle-sharp teeth, their reflection glinting nauseatingly in the slowly growing pool of blood. It is by your hand that Idira's door has been closed forever.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тело псайкера с глухим стуком оседает на пол. Тошнотворные отблески хрустальных осколков пси-удушителя, словно иглы зубов чудовищной пасти, отражаются в медленно растекающейся по ним луже крови. Дверь Идиры навсегда закрылась вашими руками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira's body falls to the floor with a dull thud. The crystal shards of the psy-stifler resemble horrific needle-thin teeth as their nauseating glint reflects off the slowly growing pool of blood. It is by your hand that Idira's door has been closed forever.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira's body falls to the floor with a dull thud. The crystal shards of the psy-stifler resemble horrific needle-thin teeth as their nauseating glint reflects off the slowly growing pool of blood. It is by your hand that Idira's door has been closed forever.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira's body falls to the floor with a dull thud. The crystal shards of the psy-stifler resemble horrifying needle-sharp teeth, their reflection glinting nauseatingly in the slowly growing pool of blood. It is by your hand that Idira's door has been closed forever.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira's body falls to the floor with a dull thud. The crystal shards of the psy-stifler resemble horrifying needle-sharp teeth, their reflection glinting nauseatingly in the slowly growing pool of blood. It is by your hand that Idira's door has been closed forever.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira's body falls to the floor with a dull thud. The crystal shards of the psy-stifler resemble horrifying needle-sharp teeth, their reflection glinting nauseatingly in the slowly growing pool of blood. It is by your hand that Idira's door has been closed forever.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉的身体“砰”的一声倒在地上，灵能抑制器被摔碎了，无数水晶碎片仿佛可怕的尖牙一样，反射着不断扩大的血泊。你亲手关上了伊迪拉脑中的大门，它永远都不会再打开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's body falls to the floor with a dull thud. The crystal shards of the psy-stifler resemble horrifying needle-sharp teeth, their reflection glinting nauseatingly in the slowly growing pool of blood. It is by your hand that Idira's door has been closed forever.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉的身体“砰”的一声倒在地上，灵能抑制器被摔碎了，无数水晶碎片仿佛可怕的尖牙一样，反射着不断扩大的血泊。你亲手关上了伊迪拉脑中的大门，它永远都不会再打开了。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}El cuerpo de Idira cae al suelo con un golpe sordo. Los fragmentos de cristal del supresor psíquico recuerdan a terribles dientes alargados como agujas, y su reflejo destella de forma repugnante en el charco de sangre en expansión. Has cerrado para siempre la puerta de Idira con tus propias manos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's body falls to the floor with a dull thud. The crystal shards of the psy-stifler resemble horrifying needle-sharp teeth, their reflection glinting nauseatingly in the slowly growing pool of blood. It is by your hand that Idira's door has been closed forever.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuerpo de Idira cae al suelo con un golpe sordo. Los fragmentos de cristal del supresor psíquico recuerdan a terribles dientes alargados como agujas, y su reflejo destella de forma repugnante en el charco de sangre en expansión. Has cerrado para siempre la puerta de Idira con tus propias manos.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idiras Körper sackt mit einem dumpfen Knall zu Boden. Die Kristallsplitter des Psi-Drosslers ähneln grauenhaften, nadelspitzen Zähnen. Sie spiegeln sich auf widerwärtige Weise in der langsam wachsenden Blutlache. Durch deine Hand wurde Idiras Tür für immer verschlossen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's body falls to the floor with a dull thud. The crystal shards of the psy-stifler resemble horrifying needle-sharp teeth, their reflection glinting nauseatingly in the slowly growing pool of blood. It is by your hand that Idira's door has been closed forever.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idiras Körper sackt mit einem dumpfen Knall zu Boden. Die Kristallsplitter des Psi-Drosslers ähneln grauenhaften, nadelspitzen Zähnen. Sie spiegeln sich auf widerwärtige Weise in der langsam wachsenden Blutlache. Durch deine Hand wurde Idiras Tür für immer verschlossen.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラの体が鈍い音を立てて床に落ちた。サイ・スティフラーの結晶の破片は針のように恐ろしく尖った歯を思わせ、徐々に広がる血だまりの中で不気味にキラキラと反射している。あなたの手によって、イディラの扉は永遠に閉じられたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's body falls to the floor with a dull thud. The crystal shards of the psy-stifler resemble horrifying needle-sharp teeth, their reflection glinting nauseatingly in the slowly growing pool of blood. It is by your hand that Idira's door has been closed forever.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラの体が鈍い音を立てて床に落ちた。サイ・スティフラーの結晶の破片は針のように恐ろしく尖った歯を思わせ、徐々に広がる血だまりの中で不気味にキラキラと反射している。あなたの手によって、イディラの扉は永遠に閉じられたのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira s'effondre au sol dans un bruit sourd. Les éclats cristallins du carcan psychique ressemblent à d'horribles dents incroyablement pointues et leurs reflets scintillent de façon écœurante dans la flaque de sang qui s'étend lentement. Grâce à vous, la porte d'Idira est fermée à jamais.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's body falls to the floor with a dull thud. The crystal shards of the psy-stifler resemble horrifying needle-sharp teeth, their reflection glinting nauseatingly in the slowly growing pool of blood. It is by your hand that Idira's door has been closed forever.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira s'effondre au sol dans un bruit sourd. Les éclats cristallins du carcan psychique ressemblent à d'horribles dents incroyablement pointues et leurs reflets scintillent de façon écœurante dans la flaque de sang qui s'étend lentement. Grâce à vous, la porte d'Idira est fermée à jamais.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira'nın bedeni, küt diye yere yığılıyor. Ruhboğanın kristal parçaları, korkunç ve iğne gibi sert dişleri andırıyor. Yansımaları, yavaşça büyüyen kan havuzunda mide bulandırıcı bir şekilde ışıldıyor. İdira'nın kapısının sonsuza dek kapanmasına neden oldun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's body falls to the floor with a dull thud. The crystal shards of the psy-stifler resemble horrifying needle-sharp teeth, their reflection glinting nauseatingly in the slowly growing pool of blood. It is by your hand that Idira's door has been closed forever.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira'nın bedeni küt diye yere yığılıyor. Ruhboğanın kristal parçaları korkunç ve iğne gibi sert dişleri andırıyor. Yansımaları yavaşça büyüyen kan havuzunda mide bulandırıcı bir şekilde ışıldıyor. İdira'nın kapısı, senin ellerinle sonsuza dek kapandı.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
